result.title: Cormen Medal 2017
result.content:
Hello Codeforces,

Long awaited Cormen Medal is back this year!

Nominations

Without further ado here are the nomination for this year:

  • The most creative solution author
  • The most creative problem author

Prizes

The prizes for this year's winners are as follows:

For the most creative solution

  • A beautiful trophy
  • The Art of Problem Solving, signed by Donald Knuth himself

For the most creative problem

  • A beautiful trophy
  • The Art of Problem Making, signed by Donald Trumpet himself

We are yet to decide the winners. So feel free to nominate your favorites so that we won't miss the best of the best. Who have been the most creative members of our community in 2016? Let your voice be heard in the comments.
